articles.title: Commonwealth Games: 2026 event in doubt after Victoria cancels - BBC
articles.description: Victoria says the cost of the tournament had ballooned to three times original estimates.
articles.content:
The 2026 Commonwealth Games are in doubt after the Australian state of Victoria cancelled its plans to host due to budget blowouts.

articles.title: Perseid meteor shower 2023 tonight: How to see spectacular shooting stars - BBC Science Focus Magazine
articles.description: The Perseid meteor shower begins tonight, and unlike last year, viewing conditions are set to be excellent. It’s one of the best meteor showers of the year: here’s how and when to watch
articles.content: A full Moon last year drowned out the peak of the Perseids, but this year the annual meteor shower will be brighter and more exciting. That is, if the clouds hold. Its one of the most active showers … [+6848 chars]

articles.title: On the first year of astronomical discoveries by the James Webb Space Telescope - WSWS
articles.description: Rho Ophiuchi is the nearest star-forming region to Earth and includes dozens of young stars, the majority of which are estimated to be less than 1 million years old.
articles.content: Wednesday marked the first anniversary of the start of science operations of the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST), the most powerful space-based astronomical observatory ever launched. It is jointly… [+8447 chars]
